main.habitivity.services

Class LocalHabitService

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.habitivity.services.LocalHabitService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHabitService

    public class LocalHabitService
extends java.lang.Object
implements IHabitService
    Created by Shally on 2017-11-09. Provides CRUD (create, read, update, delete) methods for habits and habit events stored locally on the device
